name: Pass The Goose!
description:
Made on a whim based on a running joke Gilbert The Goose has on their Twitter!

Instructions:

Pass the goose (gently) across the stage using the Z, X, C, V, B, N, M and Comma keys!

R = Restart.

 Don't drop the goose. Don't stress the goose. Don't run out of time!

(If you want to have some more fun you can use the number keys 1-8 to change the "boinginess" setting. 

Let me know which you prefer, in case I make more levels?)

You can find Gilbert the Goose right here: https://twitter.com/gilbert_goose


Credits:

Music: https://www.playonloop.com/2021-music-loops/silly-encounter/

Sound effects: https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-packs/retro-game-musical-tones/?aff=28
